thread.title: WTF | The 10 Best Hotline Bling Parodies We've Seen So Far
thread.title_full: WTF | The 10 Best Hotline Bling Parodies We've Seen So Far - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: WTF | The 10 Best Hotline Bling Parodies We've Seen So Far
text:
It's not even released a wet week and already, Drake's Hotline Bling has become the most important music video of 2015.
This is primarily due to the fact that it's utterly ripe for parody. In fact, in the past day or two, there's been a wealth of parodies uploaded all over Vine and YouTube.
Because we're all about that important news, we've decided to count down the best of the very best Hotline Bling parodies.
Take a look.
10. HOTLINE SALSA-BLING
9. HOTLINE YACHT ROCK (Personal favourite)
8. HOTLINE CHARLIE BLING
7. HOTLINE GHOSTBUSTING BLING
6. HOTLINE CHARIZARD
5. HOTLINE IDAHO (Actually, this is our personal favourite)
4. HOTLINE JACK RABBIT SLIMS
3. HOTLINE CARLTON
2. HOTLINE STAR LORD
1. HOTLINE THRILLER
>
